description: Learn how to make a deliciously cheesy pull-apart loaf that's infused with a homemade kale pesto. There'll be no going back to plain bread after this.
name: Kale & Parmesan Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup plain bread and pizza flour

recipeInstructions.text: Combine remaining yoghurt and 1 tbs water. Brush over dough. Scatter over pepitas. Place pan on a baking tray. Bake, covering with foil if it gets too dark, for 45 minutes or until risen and golden. Serve with reserved pesto.

Combine remaining yoghurt and 1 tbs water. Brush over dough. Scatter over pepitas. Place pan on a baking tray. Bake, covering with foil if it gets too dark, for 45 minutes or until risen and golden. Serve with reserved pesto.
